mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_KNAME, D.EDEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(M.MEMBER_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_NO) JOIN E_DEPARTMENT D ON(E.EDEPT_CODE = D.EDEPT_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
